Needless to say, most of the highest members of the society are demons specialized in seduction.

Contact, at last. I shall be there.
This sounds like a trap. I'll not attend.

I take a seat at a table in the corner as I await my contact. A barmaid brings over a tankard and places it on the table, its contents foaming over. She leans forward, giving me a clear view of her cleavage.
  "What have we here? An orphan in search of it's mother?"
  I look the tavern wench over intently. I understand that [GetLilithName] is viewed as a mother to many. I lick my lips in anticipation and nod in acknowledgement of her question.
  "Is that so?" Her eyes seem to sparkle. She bites her lip and lets a small drop of blood fall into the tankard of ale. Her lips twist in a maniacal smile as she slides the tankard of ale over.
  "Know that my Mother sees through me. My blood carries her gift of judgement. If you hold true desire or love for my Mother, then drink up and see if she accepts you. If she does not, your end will be a painful one."
  I look at the foaming tankard and notice that it seems to boil with an unnatural fervor. I meet the gaze of the emissary. I can drink and accept the judgement or leave now.
I remain true to my convictions and accept.

Or turn away now and forget what shadows you've witnessed."\n  I can sense that this is the moment. If I go forward, and I don't like what I see, it could be too late to back out. Potentially making enemies of the Society. So if I proceed, and go with the shadowy figure, I must be certain of my resolve.
I will not back out now. I accept all that is required.
I've made a mistake. I shall abandon my pursuit.
